mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, boardid, boardtitle, memID ,imagepath, cateID FROM ( SELECT b.boardid, b.boardtitle, b.memID ,b.regdate, i.imagepath, b.cateID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY b.boardid ORDER BY CASE WHEN i.imagetype = 'thumbnail' OR i.imagetype = NULL THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) as rn FROM board b JOIN image i ON b.boardid = i.boardid WHERE b.boardID >= #{currentBoardID} AND b.memID = #{memID} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 9 AND imagetype = 'thumbnail' ORDER BY boardid DESC, rn ASC
select i.IMAGEID, i.IMAGEPATH, i.BOARDID from image i where i.BOARDID = #{boardID}
select count(*) from board b where b.memid = #{memID}

SELECT b.boardid, MAX(b.boardtitle) AS boardtitle, MAX(b.cateid) AS cateid, MAX(b.memid) AS memid, MAX(i.imagepath) AS imagepath FROM board b JOIN image i ON i.boardid = b.boardid GROUP BY b.boardid ORDER BY b.boardid ASC
select boardID from board where boardTitle = #{boardTitle}
mapper.insert: insert into board (boardid, boardtitle, boardcontent, regdate, cateid, memid) values (BOARDID_SEQ.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, #{cateID}, #{memID})
insert into image (imageid, imagePath, boardid) values (IMAGEID_SEQ.nextval, #{imagePath}, #{boardID})
mapper.select: select rownum, a.* from( select MIN(i.imageid) imageid, MIN(i.imagepath) imagepath, i.boardid, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.cateid, b.regdate from image i join board b on i.boardid = b.boardid group by i.boardid, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.cateid, b.regdate order by b.regdate desc ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum, imageid, imagepath, cateid, boardid, boardcontent from( select MIN(i.imageid) imageid, MIN(i.imagepath) imagepath, i.boardid, b.boardContent, b.cateid from image i join board b on i.boardid = b.boardid where i.boardid >= 1 and cateid = #{cateID}
group by i.boardid, b.boardContent, b.cateid ) where rownum <= 9 order by boardid desc
